reviewText: The first part of this video was a little too basic for me but the majority was a great help to me with some new ideas. The description given for this product just didn't have enough information about the contents of the video as far as I was concerned but the video was good for what it contained.

Love this art dvd by Susan this one is so much fun , I have seen her
do some of these pictures on PBS tv, and they are great .. what can I say
she is easy to follow as a teacher , and you get addicted to her style of painting
have fun i sure am ...........goldenyrs43
